short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ensures that I is always before E, except after C.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Taught in schools around the world, this golden rule of grammar is slowly falling to the wayside as corrupt individuals seek to tarnish its perfection. Day by day, the exceptions to the rule grow, almost appearing as if the number of exceptions outwiegh the number of words that follow the rule. But no more! With this extension, one can browse the Internet in peace, knowing that all I's are before E's, except after C's. Just as it should be.

Repository: https://github.com/alecbrick/I-before-E
